thread.title: 'Housefull 3' cast is having a ball while shooting for film in London
thread.title_full: 'Housefull 3' cast is having a ball while shooting for film in London

author: Deccan
title: 'Housefull 3' cast is having a ball while shooting for film in London
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 14, 2015, 10.43 am Mumbai: Akshay Kumar, Abhishek Bachchan, Jacqueline Fernandez, Riteish Deshmukh, Nargis Fakhri and Lisa Haydon are having a ball shooting for their upcoming film 'Housefull 3' in London. While the film's shoot is going as per schedule, the team is making sure that they take some time out and chill together. Akshay's lovely wife Twinkle Khanna also accompanied the cast on their Norwich tour. Read: Akshay Kumar and Twinkle Khanna roam around in England Riteish Deshmukh shared a picture where the entire team of 'Housefull 3' has managed to squeeze in a car and take a selfie. The third instalment of the ‘Housefull’ flick will only hit theatres next year, but has managed to capture their fans’ attention with the number of pictures and hilarious videos from the sets. (Photo: Twitter)
